loginDescription: Injiza amakuru yawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu gice cy'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho ibyahiswemo by'ibanze bya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kumenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe mu manota no mu mariporo.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe agashushanyo k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha ry'imeyili ku byabaye muri sisitemu riteganyijwe mu bizaza kandi ntirihari ubu.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiyongereyeho nk'ikoherezwa ry'amakuru muri PDF/Excel ku mariporo yose, iboneza ryimbitse ry'amariporo, n'igenamiterere ry'itumanaho (urugero: imenyesha SMS/imeyili) biteganyijwe mu bizaza bya Report-Manager Lite. Amahitamo ahari yo "Kohereza nka CSV" atanga uburyo bw'ibanze bwo gukuramo amakuru.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
platformPurpose: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Injiza mu buryo bworoshye kandi ubungabunge inyandiko zuzuye z'amasomo z'abanyeshuri bose.
featureReportCardsDesc: Kora mu buryo bwikora raporo z'amanota zirambuye kandi zikoze neza kuri buri gihembwe.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Menyesha ababyeyi iterambere ry'abana babo ukoresheje ubutumwa bugufi (Ikirikurikira).
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Kurikirana ubwitabire bwa buri munsi kandi ubike inyandiko z'imyitwarire y'abanyeshuri.
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Bona raporo zifite ubushishozi ku mitsindire y'umuntu ku giti cye n'iy'ishuri.
featureAssignmentsDesc: Genzura imikoro yo mu rugo, imishinga, n'indi mikoro mu buryo bukora neza (Ikirikurikira).
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Bika mu mutekano udosiye n'inyandiko z'ingenzi zerekeye abanyeshuri (Ikirikurikira).
featureCommunication: Korohereza itumanaho hagati y'abarimu n'ubuyobozi bw'ishuri
featureCommunicationDesc: Nonoza inzira z'itumanaho ry'imbere mu kigo kugira ngo habeho ubufatanye bwiza.
